'''/warden_spawn_tracker''' is a command that can be enabled with the [[debug property]] <code>-DMC_DEBUG_DEV_COMMANDS</code>. It sets how many warnings a [[sculk shrieker]] gives before spawning a [[warden]].

== Syntax ==
<code>warden_spawn_tracker clear</code>
: Clears the player's warnings.
<code>warden_spawn_tracker set <warning_level></code>
: Sets the player's warnings to the specified number.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|warning_level|integer}}
: Specifies the level to set the player's warnings to.
: {{arg desc|je=integer|min=0|max=4}}
